title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Global Digital Assets & Investment Summit | 30 Sep.- 01 Oct. 2022 | SingaporeEvent Website: https://globaldigitalassetsummit.com/The Global Digital Assets Investment Summit is a gathering of experts design around to bring together industry leaders from Crypto, Fintech, DeFi, NFT, Metaverse, Web3, Financial Institutions and Investment Companies to discuss the future of investments in Digital Assets. There will be keynotes, exhibitions and panel discussions with top industry leaders including the area of focus to value of bitcoin and other digital assets, future market opportunities and development around collectables and gaming, emerging regulation around crypto assets and trading, as well as the application of NFTs and the metaverse to personal identity. The Digital Asset Investment Summit offers unique networking opportunities for attendees to connect with industry leaders and innovators who are looking to explore future ofÂ  Decentralized Finance and Digital Assets.
